v^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= \left(\frac{\partial v^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + v^{\nu} mathvariant="normal">.</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{v}}{\partial x^{\mu}} &amp;= \left(\frac{\partial v^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}}, \\ \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{v}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}} &amp;= \left(\frac{\partial v^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \boldsymbol{\tilde{e}_{\lambda}}, \\ \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{v}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}} &amp;= \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \left(\frac{\partial v^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \boldsymbol{\tilde{e}_{\lambda}}, \\ \delta^{\lambda}_{\alpha} \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{v}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}} &amp;= \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \left(\frac{\partial v^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{\tilde{e}_{\lambda}}, \\ \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{v}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} &amp;= \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} v^{\sigma}{}_{;\mu} \boldsymbol{\tilde{e}_{\lambda}}, \\ \tilde{v}^{\lambda}{}_{;\alpha} &amp;= \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} v^{\sigma}{}_{;\mu}. \\ \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span accent="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>~</mo></mover><mi>λ</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">∂</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup></mrow></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi accent="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>~</mo></mover><mi>λ</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">∂</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup></mrow></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">∂</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">∂</mi><msup><mover accent="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>~</mo></mover><mi>α</mi></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">∂</mi><msup><mover accent="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>~</mo></mover><mi>β</mi></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} \frac{\partial \tilde{v}^{\lambda}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} + \tilde{v}^{\nu} \tilde{\Gamma}^{\lambda}{}_{\alpha \nu} &amp;= \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \left(\frac{\partial v^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}} \left(\frac{\partial x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \tilde{v}^{\beta}\right) + \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\gamma}} \tilde{v}^{\gamma} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \left(\frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\rho}} \left(\frac{\partial x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \tilde{v}^{\beta}\right) + \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\gamma}} \tilde{v}^{\gamma} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \left(\frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \left(\frac{\partial^2 x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\rho} \partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \tilde{v}^{\beta} + \frac{\partial x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \frac{\partial \tilde{v}^{\beta}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\rho}}\right) + \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\gamma}} \tilde{v}^{\gamma} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \left(\delta^{\rho}_{\alpha} \left(\frac{\partial^2 x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\rho} \partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \tilde{v}^{\beta} + \frac{\partial x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \frac{\partial \tilde{v}^{\beta}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\rho}}\right) + \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\gamma}} \tilde{v}^{\gamma} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \left(\frac{\partial^2 x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha} \partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \tilde{v}^{\beta} + \frac{\partial x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \frac{\partial \tilde{v}^{\beta}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} + \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\gamma}} \tilde{v}^{\gamma} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \frac{\partial^2 x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha} \partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \tilde{v}^{\beta} + \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \frac{\partial x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \frac{\partial \tilde{v}^{\beta}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} + \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\gamma}} \tilde{v}^{\gamma} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \frac{\partial^2 x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha} \partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \tilde{v}^{\beta} + \delta^{\lambda}_{\beta} \frac{\partial \tilde{v}^{\beta}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} + \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\gamma}} \tilde{v}^{\gamma} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \frac{\partial^2 x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha} \partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \tilde{v}^{\beta} + \frac{\partial \tilde{v}^{\lambda}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} + \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \tilde{v}^{\beta} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \tilde{v}^{\beta} \left(\frac{\partial^2 x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha} \partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} + \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) + \frac{\partial \tilde{v}^{\lambda}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}}, \\ \tilde{v}^{\beta} \tilde{\Gamma}^{\lambda}{}_{\alpha \beta} &amp;= \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \tilde{v}^{\beta} \left(\frac{\partial^2 x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha} \partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} + \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right), \\ \tilde{\Gamma}^{\lambda}{}_{\alpha \beta} &amp;= \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \left(\frac{\partial^2 x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha} \partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} + \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \frac{\partial x^{\mu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha}} \frac{\partial x^{\nu}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} + \frac{\partial \tilde{x}^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \frac{\partial^2 x^{\sigma}}{\partial \tilde{x}^{\alpha} \partial \tilde{x}^{\beta}}, \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" mathvariant="bold-italic">n</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">n</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} \nabla_{\frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{v} &amp;= \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{v}}{\partial x^{\mu}} - \boldsymbol{n} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}} \left(v^{\nu} \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}}\right) - \boldsymbol{n} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}} + v^{\nu} \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}}}{\partial x^{\mu}} - \boldsymbol{n} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}} + v^{\nu} \left(\Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + L_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{\hat{n}}\right) - \boldsymbol{n} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + v^{\nu} L_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{\hat{n}} - \boldsymbol{n} \\ &amp;= \left(\frac{\partial v^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + v^{\nu} L_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{\hat{n}} - \boldsymbol{n}, \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" mathvariant="normal">∂</mi><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>v</mi><mi>θ</mi></msup><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} v^{\theta}{}_{;\theta} &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\theta}}{\partial \theta} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\theta \nu} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\theta}}{\partial \theta}, \\ v^{\theta}{}_{;\phi} &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\theta}}{\partial \phi} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\phi \nu} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\theta}}{\partial \phi} + v^{\phi} \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\phi \phi} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\theta}}{\partial \phi} - \frac{v^{\phi}}{2} \sin (2\theta), \\ v^{\phi}{}_{;\theta} &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\phi}}{\partial \theta} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\phi}{}_{\theta \nu} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\phi}}{\partial \theta} + v^{\phi} \Gamma^{\phi}{}_{\theta \phi} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\phi}}{\partial \theta} + v^{\phi} \cot \theta, \\ v^{\phi}{}_{;\phi} &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\phi}}{\partial \phi} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\phi}{}_{\phi \nu} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\phi}}{\partial \phi} + v^{\theta} \Gamma^{\phi}{}_{\phi \theta} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\phi}}{\partial \phi} + v^{\theta} \cot \theta, \\ \end{align*} \begin{align*} v^{\theta}{}_{;\phi} &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\theta}}{\partial \phi} - \frac{v^{\phi}}{2} \sin (2\theta) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\theta}}{\partial \lambda} - \frac{v^{\phi}}{2} = 0, \\ v^{\phi}{}_{;\phi} &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\phi}}{\partial \phi} + v^{\theta} \cot \theta \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\phi}}{\partial \lambda} + v^{\theta} = 0. \end{align*} displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} |\boldsymbol{v}|^2 &amp;= g_{\mu \nu} v^{\mu} v^{\nu} \\ &amp;= \left(\cos \frac{\lambda}{\sqrt{2}}\right)^2 r^2 + \left(-\sqrt{2} \sin \frac{\lambda}{\sqrt{2}}\right)^2 r^2 \sin^2 \theta \\ &amp;= r^2 \left(\cos^2 \frac{\lambda}{\sqrt{2}} r^2 + 2 \sin^2 \frac{\lambda}{\sqrt{2}} \sin^2 \frac{\pi}{4}\right)^2 \\ &amp;= r^2 \left(\cos^2 \frac{\lambda}{\sqrt{2}} r^2 + \sin^2 \frac{\lambda}{\sqrt{2}}\right)^2 \\ &amp;= r^2, \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:11.7603em;vertical-align:-5.6302em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mtable"><span class="col-align-r"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" class="mord boldsymbol" style="margin-right:0.03704em;">v</span></span></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">∣</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span mathvariant="normal">Γ</mi><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mi>σ</mi></msubsup><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">n</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></mi><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} \nabla_{\frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{v} &amp;= \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{v}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}} \left(v^{\nu} \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}}\right) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}} + v^{\nu} \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}} + v^{\nu} \left(\Gamma^{\sigma}_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + L_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{\hat{n}}\right) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial v^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\sigma}_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + v^{\nu} L_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{\hat{n}} \\ &amp;= \left(\frac{\partial v^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + v^{\nu} \Gamma^{\sigma}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + v^{\nu} L_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{\hat{n}}, \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" mathvariant="normal">Γ</mi><mi>λ</mi></msup><msub><mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>ν</mi><mi>σ</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi>g</mi><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">.</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} g_{\mu \nu, \sigma} = \frac{\partial g_{\mu \nu}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} &amp;= \frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\sigma}} (\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}} \cdot \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}}) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \cdot \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}} + \boldsymbol{e_{\mu}} \cdot \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\mu \sigma} \boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}} \cdot \boldsymbol{e_{\nu}} + \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\nu \sigma} \boldsymbol{e_{\mu}} \cdot \boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}, \\ g_{\mu \nu, \sigma} &amp;= \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\mu \sigma} g_{\lambda \nu} + \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\nu \sigma} g_{\mu \lambda}. \\ \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:7.8331em;vertical-align:-3.6665em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mtable"><span class="col-align-r"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" fence="true">)</mo></mrow><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} g_{\mu \nu, \sigma} + g_{\mu \sigma, \nu} - g_{\sigma \nu, \mu} &amp;= \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\mu \sigma} g_{\lambda \nu} + \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\mu \nu} g_{\lambda \sigma} + 2\Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\nu \sigma} g_{\mu \lambda} - ( \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\mu \sigma} g_{\lambda \nu} + \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\mu \nu} g_{\lambda \sigma}) \\ &amp;= 2\Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\nu \sigma} g_{\mu \lambda}, \\ \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\nu \sigma} g_{\mu \lambda} &amp;= \frac{1}{2} (g_{\mu \nu, \sigma} + g_{\mu \sigma, \nu} - g_{\sigma \nu, \mu}), \\ \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\nu \sigma} g_{\mu \lambda} g^{\mu \rho} &amp;= \frac{1}{2} (g_{\mu \nu, \sigma} + g_{\mu \sigma, \nu} - g_{\sigma \nu, \mu}), \\ \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\nu \sigma} g_{\lambda}^{\rho} &amp;= \frac{1}{2} g^{\mu \rho} (g_{\mu \nu, \sigma} + g_{\mu \sigma, \nu} - g_{\sigma \nu, \mu}), \\ \Gamma^{\rho}{}_{\nu \sigma} &amp;= \frac{1}{2} g^{\mu \rho} (g_{\mu \nu, \sigma} + g_{\mu \sigma, \nu} - g_{\sigma \nu, \mu}) \\ &amp;= \frac{1}{2} g^{\mu \rho} \left(\frac{\partial g_{\mu \nu}}{\partial x^{\sigma}} + \frac{\partial g_{\mu \sigma}}{\partial x^{\nu}} - \frac{\partial g_{\sigma \nu}}{\partial x^{\mu}}\right), \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span mathvariant="bold-italic">σ</mi></msub></mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>μ</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>ν</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></mfrac><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">Γ</mi><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mi>σ</mi></msubsup><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">σ</mi></msub></mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo fence="true">(</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>λ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>μ</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>ν</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></mfrac><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">Γ</mi><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mi>σ</mi></msubsup><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">σ</mi></msub></mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} \nabla_{\frac{d}{d\lambda}} \frac{d}{d\lambda} &amp;= \frac{d}{d\lambda} \left(\frac{d}{d\lambda}\right) \\ &amp;= \frac{d}{d\lambda} \left(\frac{d x^{\mu}}{d \lambda} \frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}}\right) \\ &amp;= \frac{d^2 x^{\mu}}{d \lambda^2} \boldsymbol{e_{\mu}} + \frac{d x^{\mu}}{d \lambda} \frac{d \boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}}{d \lambda} \\ &amp;= \frac{d^2 x^{\mu}}{d \lambda^2} \boldsymbol{e_{\mu}} + \frac{d x^{\mu}}{d \lambda} \frac{d x^{\nu}}{d \lambda} \frac{\partial \boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}}{\partial x^{\nu}} \\ &amp;= \frac{d^2 x^{\sigma}}{d \lambda^2} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + \frac{d x^{\mu}}{d \lambda} \frac{d x^{\nu}}{d \lambda} \Gamma^{\sigma}_{\mu \nu} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= \left(\frac{d^2 x^{\sigma}}{d \lambda^2} + \frac{d x^{\mu}}{d \lambda} \frac{d x^{\nu}}{d \lambda} \Gamma^{\sigma}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:15.5725em;vertical-align:-7.5363em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mtable"><span class="col-align-r"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist"
